structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.text: The county for which lost, mutilated or destroyed records are supplied shall furnish or pay for the necessary books in which to make the records and for the necessary clerk hire to transcribe the records, but no fees shall be due or payable to the state or any officer for such records.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4679a-2.
